data.title: Sumeet Goradia
data.text:
Sumeet Goradia born 1 November 1980 is an choreographer and director from Mumbai who has worked as an actor for various Bollywood Movies and Tv series based on Reality Shows.

Career[edit]

Sumeet[1] started his career as actor in Zee TV serial woh then Dancer in Farah khan troupe featuring in main hoon naa as Twins then assisting like ''Farah khan, Geeta kapur, Prabhu deva, Ganesh acharya and Pony Verma'' to name a few now choreographer director of more than 500 shows 100 music videos and 50 bollywood songs have designed Bigg Boss seasons both Hindi and Regional for Endemol Shine India and many television shows for channels like ''Colors, Sony, Star plus, Sab tv and Sony pal'' now very well known as choreographer directors duo Sumeet Saahil.[2]

Filmography[edit]

Year Film Role Language 2017 Jeena Isse ka Naam Hai choreographer Hindi (Bollywood) 2004 Main Hoon Na Actor/Dancer Hindi (Bollywood) 2009 Billu Assistant choreographer Hindi (Bollywood) 2013 Super Model Choreographer Hindi (Bollywood) 2004 Woh Tv Series Hindi (Bollywood) 2017 Big Boss Choreographer Telugu Industry

Personal life[edit]

Sumeet Goradia[3] born in Gujrati family joined Entertainment business at the mere age of 13 as an Child actor to become a succesfull director today with his Brother ''Saahil Goradia[4],Later on Sumeet Got married to Television Actress Sumana das in 2014 who starred in ''Beytaab dil ki tamana'' Balaji Telefilms sony and Bairi Piya on Colors.
